data.comment: The match has started at Camp Nou.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann misses with an attempt on goal.
Betis have a goal kick.
Barcelona are pushing forward but Ansu Fati's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Betis at Camp Nou.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 8, Betis push upfield and William Carvalho gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Barcelona defence.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Barcelona.
In the minute 9, Ansu Fati of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Barcelona are coming forward and Antoine Griezmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 11, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Betis a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Throw-in for Betis at Camp Nou.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Barcelona.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Alex Moreno for Betis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Betis a goal kick.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Betis.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Betis drives forward and Cristian Tello gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 22, Ousmane Dembele puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Antoine Griezmann.
Antoine Griezmann of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Betis at Camp Nou.
Free kick Betis.
Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
An attacking Barcelona player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 32, Aissa Mandi (Betis) has received a first yellow card.
Antoine Griezmann (Barcelona) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Betis's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ansu Fati (Barcelona) gets a yellow card.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In Barcelona Betis attack through Alex Moreno. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Barcelona's Pedri has been booked in Barcelona.
Barcelona push forward at Camp Nou and Ousmane Dembele gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Betis defence.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 43, Betis have a goal kick.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
In the minute 45, Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Camp Nou the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
At Camp Nou, Alex Moreno has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Antonio Sanabria is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Great play from Sergio Canales to set up the goal.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Ansu Fati with Lionel Messi.
Pedri (Barcelona) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 49, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Antoine Griezmann.
Jordi Alba with an assist there.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Betis defender.
In the minute 51, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
At Camp Nou, Barcelona are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, In Barcelona, Cristian Tello of Betis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Antonio Sanabria gets his shot on target but fails to score for Betis.
In the minute 55, Betis have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Barcelona are pushing forward but Ousmane Dembele's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 58, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Betis a goal kick.
An attacking Barcelona player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Aissa Mandi Betis.
In the minute 61, Goal! The home team extend their lead to 3-1 thanks to a penalty from Lionel Messi.
Victor Ruiz is replacing Cristian Tello for Betis at Camp Nou.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Betis.
In the minute 65, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Trincao is replacing Ousmane Dembele for the home team.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Betis in the half of Barcelona.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
In the minute 70, Trincao of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Manuel Pellegrini (Betis) is making a second substitution, with Aitor Ruibal replacing Joaquin.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Betis.
In the minute 71, Betis make their third substitution with Loren Moron replacing Antonio Sanabria.
Barcelona's Sergi Roberto breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Betis have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Goal! Loren Moron pulls one back for Betis to make it 3-2.
Alex Moreno instrumental with a fine assist.
Barcelona push upfield but Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Martin Braithwaite is on a sub for Antoine Griezmann for Barcelona.
In the minute 79, In Barcelona Barcelona drive forward through Trincao. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Great finish from Lionel Messi to give Barcelona a 4-2 lead.
In the minute 82, Great play from Sergi Roberto to set up the goal.
Barcelona are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Miralem Pjanic is on a sub for Sergio Busquets for Barcelona.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Sergio Canales with Rodri. This is the fourth substitution made today by Manuel Pellegrini.
Throw-in for Betis in the half of Barcelona.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In the minute 88, Alex Moreno (Betis) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Martin Braithwaite (Barcelona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Betis's Loren Moron gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Corner awarded to Betis.
William Carvalho is back on the pitch.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Full-time! The final score is 5-2.
Pedri puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-2.
That's a fine assist from Sergi Roberto.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to William Carvalho for Betis who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
